layout.name: html
layout.description: A simple layout where each entry is represented as row in a table.

layout.name: simplehtml
layout.description: An HTML layout without any header or footer but very nice output. This is useful for integrating publication lists into other HTML pages.

layout.name: simplehtmlyear
layout.description: An HTML layout without any header or footer but very nice output. This is useful for integrating publication lists into other HTML pages, grouped by year

layout.name: tablerefs
layout.description: A more structured HTML output with each entry as a row in a table and additional JavaScript search function.

layout.name: tablerefsabsbib
layout.description: Similar to tablerefs but additionally includes the BibTeX source and the abstract of the publication.

layout.name: tablerefsabsbibsort
layout.description: Similar to TableRefsAbsBib, but includes possibility to sort the table by each column.

layout.name: tablerefsabsbibsortembed
layout.displayName: HTML table (with Abstract & BibTeX, sortable) - embedded version
layout.description: Similar to TableRefsAbsBib, but includes possibility to sort the table by each column.

layout.name: docbook
layout.description: This is an XML output according to the DocBook schema.

layout.name: dblp
layout.description: DBLP export your records to a DBLP conformable XML structure.

layout.name: harvard
layout.description: This exports the publication list in Rich Text Format which can be used by word processors like OpenOffice or Microsoft Word. It is formatted according to the Harvard bibliography style guidelines.

layout.name: endnote
layout.description: This is an output in RIS which is used by EndNote, another bibliography management tool.

layout.name: openoffice-csv
layout.description: CSV, or Comma Separated Values divides all fields of the entry by a comma. It is useful to import the publications into spreadsheet programs.

layout.name: text
layout.description: Another BibTeX output.

layout.name: se
layout.description: Custom output format provided by the Research Group Software Engineering, University of Bochum.

layout.name: jucs
layout.description: Output formatted according to the guidelines of the Journal of Universal Computer Science.

layout.name: imtm
layout.description: Custom output format provided by the Department of Information and Technology Management (IMTM), University of Bochum.

layout.name: din1505
layout.description: HTML output format according to the German Institute for Standardization (DIN).

layout.name: din1505year
layout.description: HTML output format according to the German Institute for Standardization (DIN), grouped by year.

layout.name: mms
layout.description: HTML output format according to the German Institute for Standardization (DIN). Special version of the Mensch-Maschine-Systemtechnik Institute.

layout.name: mmsyear
layout.description: HTML output format according to the German Institute for Standardization (DIN). Special version of the Mensch-Maschine-Systemtechnik Institute, grouped by year.

layout.name: harvardhtml
layout.description: HTML output format formatted according to the Harvard bibliography style guidelines.

layout.name: harvardhtmlyear
layout.description: HTML output format formatted according to the Harvard bibliography style guidelines and grouped by year
